testcase.name: Register a Valid user
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the registration page.........................................passed When I type in a valid and unique email of "newestuser1@a.am"...............passed And I type in a valid password of "Password123!"............................passed And I type in a valid first name of "Guy" in registration...................passed And I type in a valid last name of "Gardner" in registration................passed And I type in a valid phone number of "000-000-0000"........................passed And I click on the register submit button...................................passed Then I should be redirected to the login.html...............................passed

testcase.name: Login as new user
testcase.system-out: Given I am at the home page.................................................passed When I type in a username "newestuser1@a.am" on the home page...............passed And I type in a password "Password123!" on the home page....................passed And I click on the login button on home page................................passed Then I should be redirected to the user-page.html...........................passed
